6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah said:"I never saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) combine any two prayers except in Al-Muzdalifah, and on that day he prayed Subh before its time

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الْمَغْرِبِ وَالْعِشَاءِ بِالْمُزْدَلِفَةِ
